## About the Neon data

Main data we currently have access to:

-   Accounts
    - identifying info on every "account" (Individual or Company) who's had contact with Hubbard Hall through donations, attending performances, or participating in classes
    - includes people who have died, moved out of the area, or lost all interest in HH so needs to be filtered
    - Judy fills out fields for "deceased" and "do not contact" which allows filtering
    - fields include id #; type (Individual or Company); primary person's address, email & phone; when record created
